text_block_list.text:
It was already summer. 
We were all here for special training.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Oh man, this is really hard, huh…… 
It's hot and my feet keep slipping……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
It's hard to maintain your form, isn't it～…… 
……Hm?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Fuuu……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Ooooh～……! As expected of Verxina-san…… 
Just like when we see her at the academy, her form is beautiful……!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Even on the sand, it's almost like a painting…… 
Alright, let's stay motivated a bit longer!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Fuu. Sorry about that Trainer-san. 
Having you get this for me.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
With this, beach training is all wrapped up. ……It felt like 
the training load was a bit lighter than usual though――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Dashing on the beach is pretty effective. 
But, since it's poor footing, doing it for extended 
periods could be risky……is that about right?

――Of course. This time, I put quite 
a lot of effort in to the contents.

As a trainer, that was expected of me, but…… 
To be honest, I wanted to make up for last time……

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Next on the menu was swimming right……? 
How much longer should I rest?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Understood. Then…… 
It's about time I did something light, right?

Right. Today I'd do things perfectly for sure. I was keeping a close 
eye on times and providing towels and hydration in a timely manner.
So I could be a reliable trainer for Verxina.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Good work, Trainer-san. 
Once again, thank you for your guidance.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……You seem really tired. 
Are you okay?
choice_data_list: Maybe I was a little too enthusiastic
Maybe I was a little too enthusiastic

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
That's true for both of us. It seems like a tough 
environment gets me feeling more motivated.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Right, right. 
We talked about having a barbeque tonight.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I'm starting to get hungry now…… 
Maybe today I'll ask for some extra.
And so, we returned from training camp with high expectations――

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Wha……there's no fire starter!?!? Or lighters!?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: The meat……won't be cooked? We can't cook……? The meat……?

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text: No waaay～!! We'll only be eating raw veggies thenー!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Calm down! Everyone!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ……It'll be fine. I'll do something about it.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……No firewood or lighters, huh. 
So, what should we do……?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
To start with, we should probably figure 
out how we're going to start a fire, huh?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Ehh……Trainer-san, 
did you have something in mind?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
――Got it. Well then, 
I guess I'll start by gathering some firewood.

……Well, that's what I said but, 
I'm not really sure on the proper method.

But when it came to fires, there was a standard way to start one. 
First you needed a wooden stick to start with.

――And 15 minutes later…… 
I was already exhausted but still hadn't started a fire.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san. Everyone helped out 
and we prepared a lot of firewood.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
The fire……is still in progress it seems. 
Would you like my help?
choice_data_list: Thanks! But just a little longer!

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
No, no, it's too early for both of you to use matches. 
Just leave it to Onee-chan.

text_block_list.name: Their Mother
text_block_list.text:
Ara ara～. Will you be okay? 
You can leave it to Mama, you know～?

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text:
I-I can do it! 
I was able to do it before――

text_block_list.name: Their Mother
text_block_list.text:
……Fufuu. Then, I guess I'll leave it to you. 
"Onee-chan", right?

text_block_list.name: Young Verxina
text_block_list.text: H-here we go……taaa!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Fufu. 
Do your best, Trainer-san.
And then――when the sun was starting to set――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: …………It lit!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Oh man～ for a while there, I was worried. 
The meat's good～.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
It really is……thanks to Verxina-senpai 
we aren't stuck with raw veggies～.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
No. I didn't do anything though, really. 
The one who lit the fire was Trainer-san after all.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text:
Mumumu……that's true! Trainer-san! 
You'll be the Savior of the Meats from now on!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Truly, thanks for the hard work today. 
Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
Was Trainer-san? 
…………

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Fufuu.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
That's not it. 
It was just that you asked something so obvious.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
You always have been. Since you became my 
trainer, Trainer-san has been a point of pride.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Incredibly earnest. Always hard working――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Then, I guess that makes us two of a kind.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
……Ever since I met Trainer-san――I think I've 
come to understand the way my sisters see me.
choice_data_list: Think you can start relying on me?
Think you can start relying on me?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Yes. Then, maybe I'll take you up on that offer――

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: ――Think you can grill up some more delicious meat then?
